definition: key information/instructions/it must be borne in mind

sentences.english: Please read enclosed Registration Information before fill-in this form.
sentences.chinese: 请细阅附页注册须知，然后填写本注册表格。

sentences.english: The ticket buyer and ticket holder shall be in compliance with all contents set out in this document.
sentences.chinese: 购票人与持票人应遵守本购票须知中的所有内容。

sentences.english: If there is any inadequacy in the prospectus and the above guidelines, the organiser reserves the right for appropriate amendments.
sentences.chinese: 如比赛章程及本须知有未尽善处，大会保留修改权利。

sentences.english: If there is any inadequacy in the guidelines, the Organizer reserves the right for appropriate amendments.
sentences.chinese: 本须知如有未尽善处，大会保留修改权利。

sentences.english: Please refer to the attached Notes on Application before filling in this form.
sentences.chinese: 填写本表前请先细阅附页之申请须知。

sentences.english: Mr. Smith, it is a notic to th audinc.
sentences.chinese: 史密斯先生，这是一则观众须知。

sentences.english: The reform have been not problem-free notes.
sentences.chinese: 须知改革向来就没有一帆风顺的。

sentences.english: Please refer to the attached notes of application and exhibition schedule.
sentences.chinese: 填写前请参阅申请须知和展览节目表。

sentences.english: Please read the Notes on Application on p. 3-5 before filling in this form.
sentences.chinese: 填写前本表格请先细阅第三至五页的申请须知。

sentences.english: Please read the Student Notice before completing this form.
sentences.chinese: 填写本表格前请细阅学生须知。

sentences.english: There was an intense focus on staying safe in Europe.
sentences.chinese: 《须知》重点强调了欧洲之旅的安全问题。

sentences.english: A horful of common sense is worth buherl of learning.
sentences.chinese: 一点小须知常胜过很多有价值的学问。

sentences.english: Merely reciting the sutras without practicing the teachings within them will result in our not receiving any of their benefits.
sentences.chinese: 须知读诵经典而不能依教奉行是得不到真正利益的。

definition: you must not/Please don't.../be sure not to/on no account (do it)
to remember with reverence/to bear in mind/to keep in mind
as they say, .../as the saying goes, ...
